text: The Hyundai i10 is a car produced by Hyundai since 2008. It is the successor of the Atos, and were based on the Kia Picanto's platform. It entered its second generation in 2013 and it became popular in the UK during the scrappage scheme in 2009. == Engines == * 1.1 49 kW (66 hp) * 1.25 57 kW (78 hp) * 1.1 CRDi 55 kW (75 hp) I10 Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Hyundai i10
